short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Girikon QA Studio is a Chrome extension for Girikon QA team to perform various QA activities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GirikQA Studio record the user actions performed on a web application.

GirikQA Studio is a platform to record the user actions performed on a web application. This recorder plugin also records screenshots. It will also generate the XPath and Automation Code for every user action. User can upload these recorded steps as a Test case.

New Features: Screen Recording, Customize Command, Record GirikQA in any Language and BDD Format Support.

Very simple steps to use the tool-
1. Click on the GirikQA Studio logo in the tool bar.
2. It will open the GirikQA Studio window.
3. You can upload the written steps by clicking on upload button.
